      static void WorkflowEmailUtil.sendWorkflowMessageToNextAssign(WorkflowProcessor processor, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String emailText, java.lang.Boolean isHTML)
      This method will take the "nextAssign" role from the processor and use it to build a list of workflow emails to be sent out, either to 1 person or to a group of people that belong to the next assign role.
